p: Between 15 and 22 March 2020, persons from the German general population were recruited via press releases (print, online, local, and national), social media (e.g., Twitter), e-mail distribution lists of student councils at universities and via our department's website to participate in the online survey "How are you dealing with the coronavirus pandemic?‚Äù In addition to information on the study (type, content, duration, lottery of gift vouchers as compensation for participation), the announcements included a link to the online study. The survey was available in German language only.
